segments.ticker: LEFT-HANDED ATHLETES HAVE AN ADVANTAGE IN SPORTS
headlines: Study reveals left-handed athletes have an advantage in certain sports

segments.tts_script: A new study suggests that left-handed athletes may have an advantage in certain sports. This is due to their unpredictability against right-handed opponents.
